name: COMPRESSED GAS ASSOCIATION
sampleDescriptions: Regulation of medical gas product manufacturing; implementation of P.L. 112-144, the Food and Drug Administration Safety and Innovation Act; implementation of P.L. 115-31, the Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2017; FY 2019 Food and Drug Administration Appropriations.
